text:
e="preserve">Aspres-sur-Buëch is a commune in the Hautes-Alpes department and Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region in southeastern France.
Road.
The D993, D994A, D994B, D994 and D1075 roads pass through the commune.
The D1075 road is part of European route E712 at this point.
Geography.
The area surrounding Aspres-sur-Buëch is quite hilly.
